description_configure_lyvego: ⚙️ You can fully configure the bot on [lyvego.com]({0})
help_prefix:
You can set up a custom prefix
(Server only - Admin required)
help_description_header:
Our [discord](https://discord.gg/E4nVPd2).
You can configure the bot on [lyvego.com]({0})
Remove the <> or [] when you are using a command.
<arg> mean that arg is required
[arg] mean that arg is optional
 arg1 | arg2 mean arg1 OR arg2.
help_streamer: Send notification when the streamer goes live. (Server only - Admin required)
help_follow: Send notification when someone follow this streamer. (Server only - Admin required)
help_clips: Send notification when someone create a clips for this streamer (Server only - Admin required)
help_topclip: Get the most watch clips for the past last week. Default amount is 5. (Server only)
help_vote: Link to vote for the bot.
help_ping: Get current ping for the bot.
author_name_most_viewed_clips: {0} - Most viewed clips of the week
about_description: If you want to support us you can donate on <:kofi:693473314433138718> [Ko-fi](https://ko-fi.com/takitsu).Source code is available on <:github:693519776022003742> [Github](https://github.com/wynnex/lyvego).You can vote on [top.gg](https://top.gg/bot/702648685263323187/vote) for the bot
message_stream_live: Hey {streamer} is live on {game}! Go check it out on {link}.
error_ratelimited: {0} This command is ratelimited, please try again in {1:.2f}s
error_missing_manages_permissions: {0} If you want to be able to use all features you should give `Manage messages` permission to the bot.
error_language_not_found: {0} Sorry but `{1}` is not implemented yet or doesn't exist.
error_streamer_not_found: {0} This streamer doesn't exist, please retry with a valid one.
error_clips_not_found: {0} Sorry but there is no clips for this streamer.
